entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21392: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #299

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Catch up with The Real Time Specification for Java #99794
  • [6.0] CryptographicException : Cryptography_OAEPDecoding in Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Array.RsaDecryptAfterExport #99792
  • [API Proposal]: Add mechanism for indicating a method/constructor/property violates constraints #99788
    9.0.0
  • For `dotnet/llvm-project` only: Remove ObjWriter cpp code. #99782
  • C# Have TryGetNonEnumeratedCount check for IReadOnlyCollection<T> #99774
  • [API Proposal]: Add methods for writing and reading ULEB128 and LEB128 to BinaryPrimitives #99767
  • JIT generates different code for pointer and reference arguments #99759
  • Optimize some trivial comparison patterns for unsigned integer types #99757
    Future
  • Ubuntu Server 22.04 LTS removes dotnet-runtime-dependencies and tries to autoremove libltnng-ust1 #99752
  • [API Proposal]: Add MonthOnly type #99751
  • [Mono] Investigate using FADDP instead of FADDV in sum vector intrinsics #99749
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 9 Regressions on 3/11/2024 6:43:09 PM #99770
  • .NET6 -- Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #99745

Closed

  • NoGC region improvements #8666
  • IntrinsicsInSystemPrivateCoreLibAnalyzer throwing ArgumentException #90356
  • [wasm] `runtime-wasm-perf` not running on PRs anymore #97998
    9.0.0
  • [workloads] Package task+targets for testing workloads into an internal package #97607
    Future
  • `ObjWriterRid` always defaults to `linux-$(Platform)` on Alpine Linux on non-portable build #75636
    9.0.0
  • Add source-build leg to llvm-project #74505
    9.0.0
  • Update ComInterfaceGenerator to use collection expressions in IID creation #93151
    9.0.0
  • SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature with #xpointer(/) reference #95390
  • Missing repo tag: v7.0.17 #99707
  • `HasExited` throws Access Denied for the Idle process on Windows #96124
    Future
  • Failing test System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.BerConverterTests.Decode_Bytes_ReturnsExpected #99764
  • IntermediateAssembly should be used in ILC inputs #99731
    9.0.0
  • missing v7.0.17 tag #99754
  • SPMI: superpmi-collect broken #99758
    9.0.0
  • Investigate COMDAT folding GC info on Linux #83375
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Optimizing assemblies for size failed #96978
  • JIT: Don't give up on runtime lookup in inliner too early #81432
    9.0.0
  • Span<T> vs Span<String> difference in Morph: Structs/AddrExp #65815
    9.0.0
  • Calls to Interlocked.CompareExchange<T> prevents inlining #8662
    9.0.0
  • Is it possible to use a same dotnet.wasm with different but similary assemblies when RunAOTCompilation is true #99668
  • [mono][minijit] GC regression: v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_ #99739
  • Test failure: System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.BerConverterTests.Decode_Bytes_ReturnsExpected #99738

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix failing BerConverterTests.Decode_TestData test #99793
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Use JitEnableOptionalRelocs in getHelperFtn #99791
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK check when optimizing branch to empty unconditional #99790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix Swift multireg stores in presence of `GT_RELOAD` #99789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough quirk in fgFindInsertPoint #99783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    area-System.Security
  • Simplify mono's custom assertions #99780
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99779
    area-System.Security
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99776
    area-System.Security
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix: Using TypeBuilder as generic argument for a parent type throws #99771
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Remove ActiveIssue for a closed issue #99769
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Clean up some [InlineArray] use #99766
    needs-area-label
  • Add missing reference to native library #99765
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve precision for Sinh and Cosh TP routines #99763
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add old design docs from mono website. #99755
    documentation, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • ILCompiler: Fix values of IsSupported for HW intrinsics on 32-bit platforms #99753
    arch-arm32, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable DirectoryServices test failing lots of PRs #99773
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix analyzer failure where incorrect SemanticModel is used #91764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: enable edge checks throughout #99628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make back branches faster in the jiterpreter and clean up some code #99772
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove assert when setting DOTNET_MaxVectorTBitwidth to 512 #99630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce `HandleKindDataIsInvariant` helper #99744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix problem with scaling general loop blocks; add dumpers #99742
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support frozen struct returns for Swift calls #99704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP/2 WebSocket Abort #99703
    area-System.Net.Http
  • NativeAOT: Removed LLVM ObjWriter and LLVM dependency #99733
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] CodeQL fix set #1 #99637
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99768
    area-System.Security
  • Fix: resources leak in ActiveDirectorySchemaClass in GetPropertyValuesRecursively #99526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add basic support for `TYP_MASK` constants #99743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add edge likelihood dumping; fix one edge likelihood update case #99740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use a collection expression to assign the IID in GeneratedComInterface-generated code #99734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough restriction in fgOptimizeEmptyBlock #99634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #99651
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Support DisableTlsResume switch on Windows as well #99593
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][MT] dedicated io thread #99422
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough checks in fgNewBBbefore/after #99636
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to --produce_repro in superpmi.py script #99723
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport VMR patch for cross builds #99702
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use IntermediateAssembly instead of hard-coding the equivalent path #99732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve perf\allocs of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #99383
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • NativeAOT: Use x64->x86 MSVC cross-compiler if possible #99748
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SPMI collect #99762
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Updated MsQuic version #99681
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Fixed variable name #99756
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove dead code in MCC tests that causes compilation failure on NativeAOT win-x86 #99719
    arch-x86, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Workaround for issue #97272 when building tests #99720
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [7.0] Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99715
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99713
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [8.0] Rename MSBuild property MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicVersion -> MicrosoftNativeQuicMsQuicSchannelVersion #99714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Revise test tolerances for exp functions. #99708
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Oracle Linux support #99728
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable publishing in VMR #99432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Implement GetConservativeUpperBoundForOutgoingArgs #99726
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [CoreCLR and native AOT] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` supports generic parameters #99468
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, runtime-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Avoid using native layout info to calculate register flags for small structs where possible #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99624
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Some System.Decimal performance improvements #99212
    area-System.Numerics
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99607
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.5
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #99656
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99712
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.5
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Added SIMD support for vector 2/3/4 methods #98761
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Various optimizations for box patterns used in byreflike struct generics #99684
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • [mono] Update wasm docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix struct info value in crossgen2 #99602
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix alignment for vector types #99589
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7+ SDK requires nuget.org w/o a `PackageReference` #39544
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk incorrectly assumes IntermediateOutputDir is always a relative path #39541
  • Detect when a user uninstalls a VS-managed workload and give an actionable error #39534
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] Install .net9preview3 X64 SDK create project on Arm64 OS, the system will be blocking. #39513
  • .NET 8.0.201-> 8.0.202 SDK update breaks build #39507

Closed

  • `dotnet` should report .NET not MSBuild version #37713
    8.0.3xx
  • `dotnet test` do not respect MSBUILDTERMINALLOGGER='auto' env variable. #38654
  • Support workloads installed via Visual Studio from CLI `dotnet workload` commands #21811
    8.0.2xx
  • [NETSDKE2E] Fail to load mstest project with NET 9 preview.2 SDK installed. #39168
  • Can minor version updates in .NET SDK have breaking changes? #39473

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39533
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39532
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [wasm] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #39478
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx
  • Update WebAssembly CODEOWNERS #39479
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39445
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet watch refactoring #39410
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Create a new label with TFM of the app and the SDK used to build the image #39196
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add an image digest label to generated containers #39160
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Allow no-arg constructor and field initializers in struct declarations" #99
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update ref-struct-interfaces.md #8000

Updated

  • Add proposal for state machine restriction updates #7994

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #72552
  • In the c# editor, improve automatic inclusion of "using" directives when copying code across files. #72551
  • Avoid unnecessary InvalidCastException for VB.NET #72547
  • Document outline : automatically collapse members and enums #72546
  • System.NullReferenceException should say which reference is null #72545
  • Cannot expand ref return properties in debugger. #72544
  • Fix all warning and errors set in Editorconfig does not do what it promises #72543
  • remove and sort usings should not touch globalusings #72542
  • NRE in ConversionsBase.ClassifyImplicitConversionFromType #72541
  • Two CodeRefactoringProviders failing with InvalidOperationException #72540
  • Class <>z__ReadOnlyArray<T> generated for literal collections is not tagged with CompilerGeneratedAttribute #72539
  • Iterative code fix application - for multi fix diagnostic #72535

Closed

  • Simple Elegant Way To Impliment IPropertyNotifyChanged On Auto Properties #72550
  • Case blocks to not be indented by default #72549
  • VisitObjectInitializerExpression throws InvalidCastException on invalid VisualBasic expression #72456

PullRequests

Created

  • Add explicit package reference to System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow #72554
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • The RenameFlyout and DisposableToolTip do not use some color tokens correctly #72538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Allow ref structs to implement interfaces, respect "allows ref struct" during constraints check. #72537
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Reduce allocations in NodeExtensions.LogTables #72536
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Expose semantic tokens functionality to Razor EA #72495
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix InvalidCastException when initializing the properties of an undeclared class inside a lambda function #72480
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Check PublishData.json feeds #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72533
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ImmutableHashMap in favor of ImmutableDictionary #72520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always log LSP server processId and increase attach timeout #72531
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Revert "Remove portions of solution crawler" #72527
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not return nonexistent kinds in `SyntaxFacts`' methods #72264
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Make sure to meld string or char constants in expression in interpolated string into adjacent literal & Use `String.Concat` if possible in interpolated string in VB #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • DefiniteAssignment: allow unconverted object creation expressions within bad expressions #72454
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder #72412
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow VS Code to provide razor source geneator references. #72482
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to generate/emit dynamically build JS into the Client's Browser from SSR Blazor page? #54545
  • AsNonRenderingEventHandler + ErrorBoundary = unexpected behavior #54543
  • Prevent Identity lockout mechanism telling hackers which UserNames exist. #54542
  • Blazor Identity templates and CRUD scaffolding should use the DbContextFactory #54539
  • Active indicator for filter for QuickGrid #54537
    Backlog
  • Cannot bind StringValues for HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #54536
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #54535
    9.0-preview3
  • .NET 7/8 SDK breaks .NET Framework compilation #54544
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #54534

Closed

  • [Hot Reload] Enable Blazor hot reloading for multiple browser windows at the same time #54415
  • Fix textarea with with large amounts of text data #54538
  • State is not preserved after login in .net 8.02 #54514
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens" Version="7.4.0" not working with OpenIdConnect ? (Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect Version 8.0.3)) #54530
  • .NET 8 WebApi Experiences a TLS Handshake Error when running in a ubi8 FIPS-enabled container #54366
  • _framework/blazor.web.js & _framework/dotnet.js fail to load with 404 when changing the base URL of a .NET 8 Blazor Web App #54525
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mapaction #54481
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54494
  • IWebHostEnvironment.Environment.ContentRootPath missing trailing \ #51897
  • sending message from hubcontext not working. #54135
  • Blazor 8 reverse proxy signin-oidc not working. #54057
  • Blazor WASM: MSAL authentication stuck on login callback #54171
  • Hosted Blazor Web App throws error when opening (invalid cache?) #54285

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable publishing in VMR #54422
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • Remove KeyManagementOptions copy constructor #54516
    area-dataprotection, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • add readme for package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #54508
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during JS interop #54225
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ICanvas.FillRectangle is converting values to Single and fails #21222
  • TimePicker and TimePicker Focused and Unfocused events do not fire #21221
  • ListView (TextCell) does not work well/text is not visible in dark mode #21220
  • Memory Leak issues with CollectionView with elements with Behavior and VisualStateGroup #21216
  • Issue when Debugging FirstMAUI App #21213
    Backlog
  • Unit Testing MAUI .net8.0 version facing manifests issue #21211
  • Inconsistency in VerticalStackLayout Rendering When Closing and Reopening the Application: Different Behavior Between Android and Windows #21210
  • Unit test projects can't reference MAUI projects #21209
  • [Testing] Crash popping FlyoutPage #21206
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Set FlyoutPage.Detail = New Page() twice will crash the application when set FlyoutLayoutBehavior = FlyoutLayoutBehavior.Split #21205
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Crash adding child at runtime to RelativeLayout #21204
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Button font image source incorrectly sized on 8.0.10 when specifying a button HeightRequest #21202
    .NET 8 SR4
  • How to add a bug project directly to the Maui code repository and build this bug project so you can test or find a solution inside the Maui code? #21201
  • Shell 'CurrentPage' property does not have a value to bind it at the first load. #21200
  • BlazorWebView in Mac Catalyst does not fire events for right click #21199
  • [WinUI] Cannot customize FlyoutView easily #21198

Closed

  • CarouselView - The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #20852
  • Error when starting background service on Android 14 #21215
  • Maui Mac App Rejected on App Store Review as crashes on launch. #15047
  • Emulator crashing when using C# markup for hot reload #17178
  • Cannot register an Effect when using the templated PlatformEffect #16517
  • Setting the `Style` property using triggers within a Style resource freezes the UI #17202
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The App hang after pulling down the RefreshView C2 page on iOS and My Mac target. #17394
  • The target "GetPriOutputs" does not exist in the project #17295
  • [Mac] [iOS] [Test Flight] Crash on Published IPA #17446
  • Multiple windows Closing Exception #17787
  • .NET MAUI, Entry Size(Heighr) is Error. #17635
  • [Android] Entry.Keyboard == null regression #17899
  • Entry not getting focused if we want to set focus at the time when new activity opens #17954
  • Maui app under iOS 17.0.3 not working crash #17908
  • [regression/8.0.0] TabbedPage: Child Content overlapping Tabbed Page Menu #18096
  • Weird behavior changing scale between monitors 100% scale vs 125% #17988
  • [regression/8.0.3] Scrollview scrolling does not work in MAC and iOS platforms #19005
  • MAUI Blazor # Android system uses USB device app to reload and then black screen #19589
  • IsEnabled Not Updating as Expected with Editor's Trigger on net8.0 #19582
  • Custom CommandProperty always null on binding #20608
  • IndicatorView for CarouselView does not work #6854
  • CollectionView renders entries of same dimensions incorrectly when using MeasureFirstItem mode #8412
  • Collection View scroll is laggy #20557
  • Page Layout is not applied correctly #18984
  • FlexLayout doesn't scroll. | MAUI.NET USING .NET 8 #20890
  • Android Plattform related Errors CS0246 'MauiAppCompatActivity' & 'MauiApplication' #20847
  • On iOS, CollectionView Header size changed causes overlap #20538
  • VS17.9.3 Maui8.0.10 real machine debugging directly flashed, 8.0.7 true debugging is normal #21208
  • DisplayPromptAsync not working in iOS 17.4 #21131

PullRequests

Created

  • Create collect-dotnet-info.ps1 #21223
  • [android] fix memory leak in `TabbedPage` #21218
    platform/android 🤖, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Fix FontImageSource resize behavior #21212
    platform/windows 🪟, control-button, i/regression
  • Add missing Android Systemfonts #21207
  • Border has a 1 pixel thickness even when it's thickness property is set to 0 - fix #21197
    control-border

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix UI loop when setting ContentInset #21140
  • [ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #21151
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix XmlType .Equals override #21192
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.6 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Ported legacy tests to Appium #21175
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮, stale
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Cache SKPath to PathF.PlatformPath in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #21169
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Span] Improve attribute inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit. #33327
  • Disposing a "failed" context throws ObjectDisposedException #33326
  • Two different entities for one table #33320
  • ERROR log with event ID 20205 is raised when committing large transaction asynchronously #33319
  • Add Migration NullReferenceException after EF Core 8 upgrade #33318
  • Sqlite migrations for concurrency tokens #33316

Closed

  • EfCore.SqlServer: string.IndexOf throws NullReferenceException when applied on Int.ToString() #32618
    9.0.0-preview3
  • Consider making compiled model tests more fine-grained #33075
    9.0.0
  • Discover the compiled model automatically #24893
    Backlog
  • Exception handling in DbCommandInterceptor's ReaderExecuted method #33199

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the final 1ES images #33324
  • Update CODEOWNERS #33322

Merged

  • Fix missing type mapping for CONVERT #33311
  • Discover the compiled model automatically #33148
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.2.24157.14 #33323
  • Explicitly mark EFCore.Specification.Tests as shipping #33321
  • Add IEntityType.IsAdHoc #33312
  • Extract type mapping postprocessing to an external visitor #33308
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33317
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33303
    blocked, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33304
    blocked, tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Onboard the official build to 1ES pipeline templates #33305
    blocked, tell-mode
  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
